
#include <map>
#include <iostream>
#include <string.h>
#include <cstring>
#define pii pair<int,int>
using namespace std;
const int offset = 625;
 
string s;
int main()
{
    map<string,string>m;
    m["8"] = "ate";
    m["w8"] = "wait";
    m["gr8"] = "great";
    m["4"] = "for";            
    m["b4"] = "before";
    int runs;
    cin >> runs;
    getchar();
    while( runs-- )
    {
       getline( cin , s );
       int i = 0;
       while( i < s.size() )
       {
           string S = "";
           while( i < s.size() && s[i] != ' ' ) S += s[i++];
           
           cout << ( m.find( S ) != m.end() ? m[S] : S );
           while( i < s.size() && s[i] == ' ' ) cout << " ",i++;
       }
       //puts( "" );
       cout << endl;
    }
   // system( "pause" );
}
